info.Name: Louis Frank
info.title: About Us
info.AboutUs: We are a team of professional photographers in Dubai who have a passion for photography and love what they do. Dubai is a huge versatile city where we can see endless high-rise buildings, breathtaking architecture, fabulous deserts and snow-white beaches. With such beautiful surroundings and our expertise combined, it’s easy to turn your brightest occasions into a magical work of art. We're here to capture your special moments before they disappear, and transform them into forever memories. In a world where images are literally everywhere, we put care, attention and love into yours and help you tell your stories with photography.Our mission is simple: we want to enable everyone to have access to great photographers in the easiest, most affordable way. We guarantee you an enjoyable, stress-free and seamless experience. Let's create magic together!

Package_1.Server_Three: All pictures will be sent to your email the same day (around 100-150 pictures) + 10x edited pictures of choice.
Package_1.Server_Four: We can also do small videos on your phone for Instagram stories.
Package_1.Server_Five: We will pick you up from hotel.

Package_2.Server_Three: All pictures will be sent to your email the same day (around 200 - 250 pictures) + 15x edited pictures.
Package_2.Server_Four: We can also do small videos on your phone for Instagram stories.
Package_2.Server_Sivan: We will pick you up from hotel.

Package_3.Server_Three: All pictures will be sent to your email the same day (around 200 - 250 pictures) + 15x edited pictures.
Package_3.Server_Four: We can also do small videos on your phone for Instagram stories.
Package_3.Server_Sivan: We will pick you up from hotel.

Package_4.Server_One: 1hr shooting in the desert with camels (2x clothes change).
Package_4.Server_Two: We will pick you up from hotel and drop you back off.
